title: Our Server Concept
subtitle: How we ensure fair performance, stability, and fun for everyone.

points.title: Modular Network
points.text: Multiple specialized services (proxy, lobby, game modes) are decoupled and scalable. This lets us handle traffic spikes with ease.

points.title: Highâ€‘Performance Infrastructure
points.text: Selected locations with low latency, caching, and asynchronous processing deliver smooth gameplay.

points.title: Security & Backups
points.text: Automated backups, access restrictions, and monitoring protect data and gameplay around the clock.
